snippet: Following a slugfest of a series in which the Mets took two out of three games against the Colorado Rockies, the team could not muster the same power against the Houston Astros.
abstract: Houston Astros defeat New York Mets, 4-3, despite Mets pitcher R A Dickey carrying a no-hitter into the sixth inning.
lead_paragraph: Following a slugfest of a series in which the Mets took two out of three games against the Colorado Rockies, the team could not muster the same power against the Houston Astros.

headline.seo: Mets’ Bats Are Quiet After Big Weekend
headline.main: After Noisy Weekend, Mets’ Bats Grow Quiet
headline.print_headline: After Noisy Weekend, Mets’ Bats Grow Quiet
